__TOC__

Once BreezyBadger is out, there'll be loads of reasons to celebrate, no matter if you were directly involved the release process or just rejoice because the next iteration of the best Distribution is finally out.

October 13 is the date for "Breezy Badger Final" and many parties will be on this date but you can pick your own date! Go ahead and put down your favorite pub, park or cafe and celebrate getting Breezy out of the door!

This page is changing frequently so check back quickly! Also, it is encouraged that you take pictures of your groups so you can submit them to our gallery on <nowiki>[[http://fridge.ubuntu.com|the Fridge]]</nowiki>.
